# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position (117.5, -30.5)
Consists of steam engine (position (117.5, -30.5)), boiler (position (111.5, -32.0)), and offshore pump (position (107.5, -33.5)).

### Copper plate mine at position (62.0, -54.0)
Consists of furnace (position (62.0, -54.0)).

### Water supply system at position (107.5, -34.5)
Consists of offshore pump (position (107.5, -33.5)), pipe group (fluid system 127327, fluid water, position (107.5, -34.5)).

### Steam supply system at position (117.5, -34.5)
Consists of boiler (position (111.5, -32.0)), pipe group (fluid system 127331, fluid steam, position (117.5, -34.5)).

### Electricity distribution system at position (119.5, -30.5)
Consists of small electric pole (position (119.5, -30.5)), electricity group (id 575218, poles [(119.5, -30.5)], voltage 0).

### Belt system at position (63.5, -53.5)
Consists of belt (position (63.5, -53.5)), belt (position (64.5, -53.5)).


# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when inserting items into entities
- Ensure you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to insert them into entities.
- Check the entity's fuel or inventory requirements before inserting items.

### Errors when using offshore pumps
- Ensure the offshore pump is connected to a pipe group to function correctly.

### Errors when using boilers
- Ensure the boiler has fuel to function correctly.
- Check the boiler's connection points to ensure proper steam output.

### Errors when using steam engines
- Ensure the steam engine has a steam input to function correctly.
- Check the steam engine's connection points to ensure proper steam input.


# NAMESPACE
No utility functions have been defined by the agent.
No important variables have been assigned.
